name: Random Access Memory (Cosmic Misfit Drew)
description:
Single player, cyberpunk styled digital card game. This variant on the classic Memory a.k.a. Concentration, will challenge your observation and recall. Match cards, zone out, pretend you're a hacker.

Note: does support gamepad, mouse, and keyboard.

Development

I did hope to try more gameplay ideas, but I didn't want development to exceed a single month, so I implemented only the core game and attempted to polish it to feel like a complete experience. Even though there aren't plans to continue development, your feedback would still be very appreciated so I can learn for future games.

Trivia
  • First designed using a physical deck of poker cards.
  • This is my first ever digital card game.
  • Total development time: just over 70 hours.
